name: POLYMERVANIA
description:
Polymervania is an interactive trailer for the novella Polymer, by Caleb Wilson, which is available to order here: https://www.amazon.com/Polymer-Caleb-Wilson/dp/1621052559

Read more about the New Bizarro Author Series here: https://eraserheadpress.com/2017/11/13/new-bizarro-author-series/
